required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Healthy Volunteer Study to Evaluate the Ability of PRT064445 to Reverse the Effects of Several Blood Thinner Drugs on Laboratory Tests (Module 1 of 4)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Intravenously Administered PRT064445 After Dosing to Steady State With One of Four Direct/Indirect fXa Inhibitors in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the ability of PRT064445 to reverse the effects of several blood thinner drugs on laboratory tests. The study also is evaluating the blood levels of PRT064445 given at different doses.

detailed_description.textblock: A randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled study to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of intravenously administered PRT064445 after dosing to steady state with one of four direct/indirect fXa inhibitors in healthy volunteers

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This study has four modules with a total of 21 cohorts, each module was reported and submitted separately. Module 1, NCT01758432 (54 subjects with 7cohorts including placebo); Module 2, NCT03578146 (48 subjects with 6 cohorts including placebo); Module 3, NCT03551730 (27 subjects with 4 cohorts including placebo); Module 4, NCT03551743 (28 subjects with 4 cohorts including placebo)
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy: Percent Change From Baseline in Anti-fXa Activity at 2 Mins Following Andexanet/Placebo Administration
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 2 minutes following the end of andexanet/placebo administration
primary_outcome.description: Anti-fXa activity was measured immediately prior to (Baseline) and at 2 mins following andexanet/placebo administration. Anti-fXa activity was measured using a commercial kit (Coamatic Heparin-82 33 9363, DiaPharma)

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy: Percent Change From Baseline in Thrombin Generation at 2 Mins Following Andexanet/Placebo Administration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 2 minutes following the end of andexanet/placebo administration
secondary_outcome.description: Thrombin generation was measured immediately prior to (Baseline) and at 2 mins following andexanet/placebo administration. Thrombin generation was measured using a TF-initiated thrombin generation assay.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy: Percent Change From Baseline in Unbound Apixaban Plasma Concentration at 2 Mins Following Andexanet/Placebo Administration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 2 minutes following the end of andexanet/placebo administration
secondary_outcome.description: Unbound apixaban concentrations was measured immediately prior to (Baseline) and at 2 mins following andexanet/placebo administration. Unbound plasma concentrations for apixaban were determined by a rapid equilibrium dialysis method followed by Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectometry assay.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Cmax was taken directly from the raw data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Andexanet Time of Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Tmax was taken directly from the raw data.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Vss was calculated using a non-compartmental approach.

secondary_outcome.measure: Andexanet Area Under the Drug Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC0-inf )
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. AUC0-inf was calculated using a non-compartmental approach

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. CL was calculated using a non-compartmental approach, calculated as Dose/AUC0-inf

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electro chemiluminescent assay. t1/2 was determined by linear regression of the log concentration on the terminal portion of the plasma concentration-time curve.

arm_group.description: 90 mg PRT064445 given as a single IV
210 mg PRT064445 given as a single IV bolus
420 mg PRT064445 given as a single IV bolus

arm_group.arm_group_label: Module 1 (420 mg bolus + 180 mg infusion) 4 mg/min
arm_group.description: 600 mg PRT064445 given as follows: 420 mg IV over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min), followed by a continuous infusion of 180 mg (4 mg/min over 45 minutes)
600 mg PRT064445 given as follows: up to 420 mg IV over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min), followed by a second bolus of 180 mg IV over ~6 minutes (~30 mg/min), 45 minutes after completion of the bolus
900 mg PRT064445 given as follows: 420 mg IV, followed by a continuous infusion of 480 mg (4 mg/min over 120 minutes
Placebo administered intravenously (IV) as a bolus, two bolus doses or a bolus followed by continuous infusion.

intervention.arm_group_label: Module 1 (420 mg bolus + 180 mg infusion) 4 mg/min
Module 1 (420 mg bolus + 180 mg infusion) 4 mg/min

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men or women between the ages of 18 and 45 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- History (including family history) or symptoms of, or risk factors for bleeding
- History (including family history) of or risk factors for a hypercoagulable or thrombotic condition
- Absolute/relative contraindication to anticoagulation or treatment with specific anticoagulants
- History of major surgery, severe trauma or bone fracture within 3 months prior to dosing; or planned surgery within 1 month after dosing.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subject recruitment occurred at investigative site in the US between November 2012 through October 2013
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Apixaban was administered orally at 5 mg twice daily for 6 days to steady-state in an open label fashion. Subjects were then randomized to receive study treatment (andexanet:placebo, 6:3) intravenously at different doses/dose regimens on Day 6, all bolus doses administered such that they ended at 3 hours after the last dose of apixaban.

group.title: Module 1 Placebo
group.description: Placebo was administered intravenously (IV) as a bolus, two bolus doses or a bolus followed by continuous infusion.

group.title: Module 1 ( 90 mg)
group.description: 90 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 3 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (210 mg)
group.description: 210 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 10 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 15 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 180 mg Infusion)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed immediately by a 180 mg continuous IV infusion (4 mg/min over 45 minutes) [total 600 mg]

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 180 mg Bolus)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet/placebo IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed after 45 minutes by a second bolus of 180 mg over~ 6 minutes (~30 mg/min) [total 600 mg]

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 480 mg Infusion)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed immediately by a 480 mg continuous IV infusion (4 mg/min over 2 hours) [total 900 mg]

baseline.population: 54 subjects were enrolled in this study.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

measure.title: Age
measure.description: 54 subjects were enrolled in this study.

outcome.title: Efficacy: Percent Change From Baseline in Anti-fXa Activity at 2 Mins Following Andexanet/Placebo Administration
outcome.description: Anti-fXa activity was measured immediately prior to (Baseline) and at 2 mins following andexanet/placebo administration. Anti-fXa activity was measured using a commercial kit (Coamatic Heparin-82 33 9363, DiaPharma)
outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 2 minutes following the end of andexanet/placebo administration
outcome.population: 54 subjects who received andexanet or placebo were included in the pharmacodynamics (PD) analysis

outcome.population: 54 subjects who received apixaban were included in the apixaban pharmacokinetics (PK) analysis

outcome.title: Andexanet Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax)
outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Cmax was taken directly from the raw data.
outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
outcome.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

outcome.title: Andexanet Total Volume of Distribution (Vss)
outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Vss was calculated using a non-compartmental approach.
outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.

measure.title: Andexanet Total Volume of Distribution (Vss)
measure.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. Vss was calculated using a non-compartmental approach.
measure.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

measurement_list.measurement: Vss calculations do not take into account the 45 minute intervals between doses.

outcome.title: Andexanet Area Under the Drug Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC0-inf )
outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. AUC0-inf was calculated using a non-compartmental approach
outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
outcome.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

measure.title: Andexanet Area Under the Drug Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC0-inf )
measure.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. AUC0-inf was calculated using a non-compartmental approach
measure.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

outcome.title: Andexanet Total Systemic Clearance (CL)
outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. CL was calculated using a non-compartmental approach, calculated as Dose/AUC0-inf
outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
outcome.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

measure.title: Andexanet Total Systemic Clearance (CL)
measure.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electrochemiluminescent assay. CL was calculated using a non-compartmental approach, calculated as Dose/AUC0-inf
measure.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

outcome.title: Andexanet Apparent Terminal Elimination Half-life (t1/2)
outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electro chemiluminescent assay. t1/2 was determined by linear regression of the log concentration on the terminal portion of the plasma concentration-time curve.
outcome.time_frame: Blood was collected at predose, 0.033, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5 and 14.5 hours postdose.
outcome.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

group.title: Module 1 Placebo
group.description: Placebo was administered intravenously (IV) as a bolus, two bolus doses or a bolus followed by continuous infusion.

group.title: Module 1 ( 90 mg)
group.description: 90 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 3 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (210 mg)
group.description: 210 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 10 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 15 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 180 mg Infusion)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed immediately by a 180 mg continuous IV infusion (4 mg/min over 45 minutes) [total 600 mg]

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 180 mg Bolus)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet/placebo IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed after 45 minutes by a second bolus of 180 mg over~ 6 minutes (~30 mg/min) [total 600 mg]

group.title: Module 1 (420 mg Bolus + 480 mg Infusion)
group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed immediately by a 480 mg continuous IV infusion (4 mg/min over 2 hours) [total 900 mg]

measure.title: Andexanet Apparent Terminal Elimination Half-life (t1/2)
measure.description: Plasma concentrations of andexanet was determined using a validated method that involved analysis of citrated human plasma by an electro chemiluminescent assay. t1/2 was determined by linear regression of the log concentration on the terminal portion of the plasma concentration-time curve.
measure.population: 36 subjects who received andexanet were included in the andexanet PK analysis

reported_events.desc: Only subjects who received at least one dose of study drug were included in the safety analysis.

group.title: Module 1 Placebo
group.description: Placebo was administered intravenously (IV) as a bolus, two bolus doses or a bolus followed by continuous infusion.

group.title: Module 1 (210 mg)
group.description: 210 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 10 minutes (~30 mg/min) 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over 15 minutes (~30 mg/min)

group.description: 420 mg andexanet IV bolus administered over ~14 minutes (~30 mg/min) followed immediately by a 480 mg continuous IV infusion (4 mg/min over 2 hours) [total 900 mg]

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Conducted in healthy volunteers at Clinical Research Organization
